# ESLint Plugin

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D jsr:@ximagine/eslint-plugin
```

## Usage

```javascript
// eslint.config.js
import ximagine from "@ximagine/eslint-plugin";
import tsParser from "@typescript-eslint/parser";

export default [
  ximagine.configs.recommended,
  {
    files: ["**/*.{ts,tsx}"],
    languageOptions: {
      parser: tsParser,
    },
  },
];
```
